text: The Last Summer (, translit. Posledno lyato) is a 1974 Bulgarian drama movie directed by Christo Christov and starring Grigor Vachkov, Dimitar Ikonomov, Bogdan Spasov, Vesko Zehirev. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Movies directed by Christo Christov
title: The Last Summer (1974 movie)
